item.title: Recession Proofing My Career
item.description: I’d written originally this in August 2019 with a bit of foresight of a pending recession. I wrote this primarily for myself. Multiple reviewers have mentioned that they found it immensely useful, so sharing it with you here! Unfortunately, I didn’t follow some of the important notes here myself. Hope you do better than me!!! Hard Assumptions Recession will happen in the next 6-24 months Will hurt technology startup professionals which depend on VC money directly as pay cheques
